snippet: Johnny Gaudreau of Boston College, Eric Hartzell of Quinnipiac and Drew LeBlanc of St. Cloud State were selected as finalists for the Hobey Baker Award.
abstract: Finalists are announced for Hobey Baker Award, which honors college hockey's best player.
lead_paragraph: Johnny Gaudreau of Boston College, Eric Hartzell of Quinnipiac and Drew LeBlanc of St. Cloud State were selected as finalists for the Hobey Baker Award.

headline.seo: Johnny Gaudreau, Eric Hartzell and Drew LeBlanc Are Finalists for Hobey Baker Award
headline.main: Finalists for College Hockey’s Best Player Announced
